title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite : CY30103Retrosynthesis, stereochemistry and conformations; Acidsbases and functional group exchange reactions; Oxidation-reduction and hydroboration; Stereocontrol, ring formation and macrocyclisation; synthons that form carbon-carbon bonds; Synthetic strategies; Exercises.Books:Organic Synthesis by Michael B Smith, 2002 Organic Chemistry by J. Clayden, S. Warren, N. Greeves, P. Worthers, 2002
